name: Tetromino Zen
description:
Tetris clone game with 2 modes
  • CLASSIC MODE – If you are new in Tetris , just try and learn faster , with basic "CLASSIC MODE".
  • ARCADE MODE – For more fun , try the custom 50 level "ARCADE MODE" , in style of old school tetris game.
  • SAVE SYSTEM – If you want to save your level and progress , now you can , with multiple save system.
  • PLAY WITH ANYTHING – Exept for touch controls , you can play with any combatible
  • (Joystick - Joypad or Keyboard) you can find , for both Cable or Wireless. (Support and X-BOX controllers)
